neighbors.name: Abram P. Dye & Carrie N. Dye
neighbors.claims: Abram P. Dye and Carrie N. Dye are listed as owners of a rural parcel in Saline County, Kansas (parcel ID 085128270000000700001) [Saline County Parcel Search](https://www.salinecountyks.gov/Appraiser/parcelsearch). Local records indicate long-term residency in Salina, with family ties noted in local obituaries [Salina Journal Obituary](https://www.tributearchive.com/obituaries/20245282/Carol-Marie-Corey/wall). A search of the Saline County Planning Commission minutes from key renewable energy hearings (August 2023) shows no record of their attendance or public comment regarding development projects [Planning Commission Minutes](https://pub-salinecounty.escribemeetings.com/filestream.ashx?DocumentId=6338). There is no record of either holding a public office or leadership position in the county [Saline County Commission](https://www.salinecountyks.gov/Government/County).

approach_recommendations.engage: Have a trusted local farmer or community member start a personal conversation, emphasizing respect for their farmland and assuring that any project impact on their land and roads will be minimized.

citations.claim: Abram P. Dye and Carrie N. Dye are listed as owners of a rural parcel in Saline County, Kansas
citations.title: Saline County Parcel Search

citations.claim: Local records indicate long-term residency in Salina, with family ties noted in local obituaries
citations.title: Obituary for Carol Marie Corey - Tribute Archive

citations.claim: A search of the Saline County Planning Commission minutes from key renewable energy hearings (August 2023) shows no record of their attendance or public comment
citations.title: Saline County Planning Commission Meeting Minutes August 22, 2023

citations.claim: There is no record of either holding a public office or leadership position in the county
citations.title: Saline County Government Commission

neighbors.name: Judith L. Sapegin
neighbors.claims: Judith L. Sapegin is the recorded owner of a Saline County parcel in a rural area (ID 085128280000000700001), identified in right-of-way surveys for local infrastructure projects [KDOT ROW Survey](https://ikewebstorage.blob.core.windows.net/files/004-085_ka323002-ROW2-p1.pdf). She was not listed as an attendee or speaker in the August 2023 Saline County Planning Commission hearings regarding battery storage conditional use permits [Planning Commission Minutes](https://pub-salinecounty.escribemeetings.com/filestream.ashx?DocumentId=6338). No public comments from Sapegin about local development or clean energy issues have been found in local news sources [Salina Post](https://salinapost.com). She does not appear to serve in any local government capacity [Saline County Commission](https://www.salinecountyks.gov/Government/County).

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage her one-on-one in a respectful manner, highlighting how the plan will protect her land and family legacy, and clarify long-term safeguards for her property.

citations.claim: Judith L. Sapegin is the recorded owner of a Saline County parcel in a rural area identified in right-of-way surveys
citations.title: KDOT Right of Way Survey Reference Sheet

citations.claim: She was not listed as an attendee or speaker in the August 2023 Saline County Planning Commission hearings regarding battery storage conditional use permits
citations.title: Saline County Planning Commission Meeting Minutes August 22, 2023

citations.title: Salina Post Search

citations.claim: She does not appear to serve in any local government capacity
citations.title: Saline County Government Commission

neighbors.name: Sabrina T.S. Ozisik & Hakan Ozisik
neighbors.claims: Hakan Ozisik and Sabrina T.S. Ozisik jointly own a tract of land in rural Saline County (parcel ID 085128280000000600001), confirmed by state project maps which locate their property near McReynolds Road [KDOT Project Maps](https://ikewebstorage.blob.core.windows.net/files/projects/KA-3230-02/004-085-KA-3230-02_Public-Meeting-Project-Maps.pdf). Sabrina Ozisik is documented as being in attendance at the Saline County Planning Commission meeting on August 22, 2023, during the hearing for the 'Mountain Peak Energy Storage' Conditional Use Permit (CUP 23-103) [Planning Commission Minutes](https://pub-salinecounty.escribemeetings.com/filestream.ashx?DocumentId=6338). While she attended this critical development meeting, the minutes do not record her making a verbal public comment or statement [Planning Commission Minutes](https://pub-salinecounty.escribemeetings.com/filestream.ashx?DocumentId=6338). They are not known to hold any local public office [Saline County Commission](https://www.salinecountyks.gov/Government/County).

approach_recommendations.engage: Reach out in a neighborly way focused on how noise, traffic, and views will be managed. Acknowledge the need for transparency regarding project specifics, as they have previously attended planning meetings regarding energy storage.

citations.claim: Hakan Ozisik and Sabrina T.S. Ozisik jointly own a tract of land in rural Saline County confirmed by state project maps
citations.title: KDOT K-4 Preliminary Design Public Meeting Project Maps

citations.claim: Sabrina Ozisik is documented as being in attendance at the Saline County Planning Commission meeting on August 22, 2023
citations.title: Saline County Planning Commission Meeting Minutes August 22, 2023

citations.claim: the minutes do not record her making a verbal public comment or statement
citations.title: Saline County Planning Commission Meeting Minutes August 22, 2023

citations.claim: They are not known to hold any local public office
citations.title: Saline County Government Commission
